vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DAIInterestRateModelV3.poke (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#453-468):
	External calls:
	- (duty) = jug.ilks(ETH-A) (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#454)
	- stabilityFeePerBlock = duty.add(jug.base()).sub(1e27).mul(1e18).div(1e27).mul(15) (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#455)
	- baseRatePerBlock = dsrPerBlock().mul(1e18).div(assumedOneMinusReserveFactorMantissa) (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- baseRatePerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#458)
	- multiplierPerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#462)
	- multiplierPerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#464)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message: JugLike.base should be constant (DAIInterestRateModelV3.sol#492)
